question:
The earthworms in sample A have an average length of 2.4 inches, and the earthworms in sample B have an average length of 3.8 inches. The average length of the earthworms in the combined samples is 3.0 inches. Which of the following must be true?
Indicate all such statements.
A. There are more earthworms in sample A than in sample B.
B. The median length of the earthworms is 3.2 inches.
C. The range of lengths of the earthworms is 1.4.
Show
Hide
